offence_date.source: The particulars of the charge are that the defendant on 30 November 2023, at Room 1140, Hong Tai House, Cheung Hong Estate, Tsing Yi, New Territories, unlawfully trafficked in dangerous drugs, namely, 112.35 grammes of a solid containing 85.63 grammes of cocaine and 211.16 grammes of a solid containing 170.37 grammes of ketamine.

place_of_offence.source: The particulars of the charge are that the defendant on 30 November 2023, at Room 1140, Hong Tai House, Cheung Hong Estate, Tsing Yi, New Territories, unlawfully trafficked in dangerous drugs, namely, 112.35 grammes of a solid containing 85.63 grammes of cocaine and 211.16 grammes of a solid containing 170.37 grammes of ketamine.

cross_border.source: No cross-border activity is mentioned in the transcript; the particulars identify a location in Tsing Yi, New Territories.

trafficking_mode.source: I am satisfied that the role of the defendant is one of storekeeper and courier.

reasons_for_offence.source: He was tempted by an old school friend who promised an easy job for quick and good money. He could store some goods and make some deliveries for $16,000 a month.

He tried to return the drugs but was told if he quit the job, he would need to repay $30,000 as compensation. Since he did not have the money, he kept the drugs and followed instructions to repack drugs into smaller packets and make deliveries.

benefits_received.source: The defendant was arrested and he admitted packing and delivering drugs on instructions for monetary rewards. He admits ... the estimated retail value of the cocaine was $262,113 and the ketamine, $131,342.
